vernac_cmds: Lemma Rmetric_bound: forall x y z:R, R_metric x z < y - x -> z < y.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (x + R_metric x z).
Lemma Rmetric_bound2: forall x y z:R, R_metric y z < y - x -> x < z.
apply Rlt_le_trans with (y - R_metric y z).
replace (x - (y - R_metric y z)) with (R_metric y z - (y - x)); try ring.
replace (y - R_metric y z - (y + (z - y))) with (y - z - R_metric y z); trivial; ring.
assert (open_ball (point_set RTop) R_metric x r = Intersection [ y:R | x-r <= y /\ y <> x-r ] [ y:R | y <= x+r /\ y <> x+r ]).
replace (x0 - x - r) with (x0 - (x + r)); trivial; ring.
destruct (total_order_T (x0 - x) r) as [[|]|]; try tauto.
replace (-r - (x0 - x)) with (x - r - x0); try ring; trivial.
assert (exists eps:R, eps > 0 /\ Included (open_ball _ R_metric x eps) S).
apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin eps1 eps2); trivial.
unfold Rmin; destruct Rle_dec; auto with real.
apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin eps1 eps2); trivial.
unfold Rmin; destruct Rle_dec; auto with real.
apply Rgt_trans with r; auto with real.
replace (Q2R q - x - r) with (Q2R q - (x + r)); trivial; ring.
replace (-r - (Q2R q - x)) with (x - r - Q2R q); trivial; ring.
Lemma bounded_real_net_has_cluster_point: forall (I:DirectedSet) (x:Net I RTop) (a b:R), (forall i:DS_set I, a <= x i <= b) -> exists x0:point_set RTop, net_cluster_point x x0.
assert (forall i:DS_set I, { y:R | is_glb (Im [ j:DS_set I | DS_ord i j ] x) y }).
assert ({ x0:R | is_lub (Im Full_set (fun i:DS_set I => proj1_sig (X i))) x0 }).
assert (forall i j:DS_set I, DS_ord i j -> proj1_sig (X i) <= proj1_sig (X j)).
replace (y0 - x0 - r) with (y0-(x0+r)); trivial; ring.
apply Rge_trans with x3; auto with real.
Lemma R_closed_interval_compact: forall a b:R, a <= b -> compact (SubspaceTopology ([x:point_set RTop | a <= x <= b])).
pose (y := fun i:DS_set I => proj1_sig (x i)).
assert ([x:point_set RTop | a <= x <= b] = Intersection [ x:point_set RTop | a <= x ] [ x:point_set RTop | x <= b ]).
constructor; red; intros; auto with real.
destruct (total_order_T x1 y0) as [[|]|]; auto with real.
constructor; red; intros; auto with real.
destruct (total_order_T x1 y0) as [[|]|]; auto with real.
assert (Ensembles.In [x:point_set RTop | a <= x <= b] x0).
destruct (H0 V H5 H7 i) as [j []].
Lemma R_compact_subset_bounded: forall A:Ensemble (point_set RTop), compact (SubspaceTopology A) -> bound A.
destruct (H (Im Full_set (fun y:R => inverse_image (subspace_inc _) [ x:point_set RTop | y - 1 < x < y + 1 ]))).
replace [x0:point_set RTop | x-1 < x0 < x+1] with (Intersection [x0:point_set RTop | x-1 <= x0 /\ x0 <> x-1] [x0:point_set RTop | x0 <= x+1 /\ x0 <> x+1]).
destruct (total_order_T (x-1) x0) as [[|]|]; auto with real.
apply Rlt_le_trans with (x-1); auto with real.
destruct (total_order_T x0 (x+1)) as [[|]|]; auto with real.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (x+1); auto with real.
constructor; constructor; split; auto with real.
split; apply Rminus_lt; auto with real.
assert (exists a:R, forall S:Ensemble (point_set (SubspaceTopology A)), forall b:point_set (SubspaceTopology A), Ensembles.In x S -> Ensembles.In S b -> proj1_sig b < a).
cut (Included A0 (Add A0 x)); auto with sets.
unfold Rmax; destruct Rle_dec; auto with real.
assert (Ensembles.In (FamilyUnion x) (exist (fun x:R => Ensembles.In A x) x0 H4)).
apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
cut (forall S:Ensemble (point_set RTop), clopen S -> Ensembles.In S 0 -> S = Full_set).
cut (forall S:Ensemble (point_set RTop), clopen S -> Ensembles.In S 0 -> forall x:R, x > 0 -> Ensembles.In S x).
assert (forall S:Ensemble (point_set RTop), clopen S -> Ensembles.In S 0 -> forall x:R, x < 0 -> Ensembles.In S x).
pose (T := [ y:R | forall z:R, 0 <= z <= y -> Ensembles.In S z ]).
apply Rlt_le_trans with 0; auto with real.
apply Rle_lt_trans with 0; auto with real.
Lemma R_cauchy_sequence_bounded: forall x:nat->R, cauchy R_metric x -> bound (Im Full_set x).
assert (exists y:R, forall n:nat, (n<N)%nat -> x n <= y).
Lemma R_cauchy_sequence_lower_bound: forall x:nat->R, cauchy R_metric x -> lower_bound (Im Full_set x).
replace (R_metric (- x m) (- x n)) with (R_metric (x m) (x n)).
replace (x n - x m) with (- (- x n - - x m)) by ring.
destruct (bounded_real_net_has_cluster_point nat_DS x a b) as [x0].
intros; split; [ cut (x i >= a); auto with real; apply H1 | apply H0 ]; exists i; trivial; constructor.
apply metric_space_net_cluster_point with R_metric; try apply MetricTopology_metrizable.
